name: Ultimate Brick Breaker 2021
description:
Ultimate Brick Breaker 2021 is a casual physics-based 2D arcade game where players must journey through Medieval, Ice and Technology themed levels while destroying pesky bricks along the way. Player reaction time and accuracy will be challenged as you attempt to destroy every brick in a level without allowing the ball to get by. Power-ups that switch up the flow of gameplay may drop from destroyed bricks and aid you in your quest to reach the end. 

Features: 

  • Multiple themed levels
  • 2D assets that bring character to the game world 
  • Responsive controls for quick reactive movements. 
  • Exciting power-ups that allow the player to progress through the game differently. 
  • Interesting brick designs that challenge the player.
